body.content:
Dear Eve

Thanks for your mail

The investor Madam. Guadiola Fabrigaz need to invest certain huge
amount of funds in your country with your help and assistant.

Which area of business will you like the funds to be invested into
that will be yielding a profitable / good annual return.

Which business are you into or have the knowledge currently or even
bring idea of in case you are not currently into business.

Before i will introduce you to Madam Guadiola Fabrigaz, i will like to
have your assurance of your full  maximum cooperation NOT to let her
or the transaction down at all and also on your return email, SEND (1)
Your full names (2) Your current contact mailing address that can
receive parcel (3) Your direct contact phone numbers for easy
communication.

As soon as i hear back from you, we will swing into action fully in
doing and perfecting the needful that will authenticate the approval
and subsequent funds release follow

Awaiting to hear from you

Best Regards,
Mr Andrew Smith

header.subject: Re: How can i help with this?
